person.persName: Samuel Kline Morris (Henry County and Daviess County, Kentucky, retired merchant.)

body.p: Henry County and Daviess County, Kentucky, retired merchant. Native of France. Married to Margaret Sarah Roberts Morris in Henry County, Kentucky, on July 6, 1852. Father of Julia Morris and Fannie Morris. Retired merchant in Henry County in 1860. Postmaster in Daviess County from July 12, 1860 to October 16, 1861. Merchant in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1863.
